bibl.title: Indo-Roman Trade: The Ceramic Evidence from Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Sourcing studies of the ceramics found at Roman Berenike show that India or the neighbouring regions supplied many styles and types of pottery. - Introduction. - Table wares. - Utilitarian wares. - Implications. - References.
bibl.seg: TOMBER Roberta, Indo-Roman Trade: The Ceramic Evidence from Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
Antiquity 74, No. 285 (September 2000) pp. 624-631, profils, 3 figg., 1 carte.

Sourcing studies of the ceramics found at Roman Berenike show that India or the neighbouring regions supplied many styles and types of pottery. - Introduction. - Table wares. - Utilitarian wares. - Implications. - References.
